**_Address given in confirmation email additional info, Elevator access_**

**Facilitated by** [Dominus Eros](https://www.dominuseros.com/)

**Join us in an intimate embrace of beautiful and communal energy!**

Queer Kiss & Cuddles is an inclusive gathering that radiates warmth, acceptance, and the vibrant spirit of the LGBTQIA+ community. In a beautiful and warm energetic space, attendees converge to celebrate love in all its forms. Here, affection knows no boundaries as individuals of diverse backgrounds come together to share tender kisses, comforting embraces, and genuine connections. It's a sanctuary where everyone is encouraged to express their authentic selves without fear of judgment, fostering a sense of belonging and empowerment within a safe and welcoming environment.

Throughout the event, laughter mingles with whispered conversations and the gentle sound of embraces, creating an atmosphere of joy and camaraderie. Whether exchanging playful pecks on the cheek or sharing heartfelt cuddles, each interaction is a testament to the power of love to transcend differences and unite people in solidarity. As the night unfolds, memories are made, friendships are forged, and the bonds of community grow stronger, leaving a lasting impression of acceptance, love, and the beauty of queer expression.

In addition to the spirit of the event we will have guided meditation and sound bath cuddle puddles. Spiritual connection enhances an already proven healer in hugs/touch via cuddles and opportunities for a fun and flirty kisses arise in a cultivated container of queer joy.

_Note: This a Queer LGTBQIA+ Centered experience with focus on Bi/Pansexual+ interactions, which if you are curious/questioning we welcome you to explore in an intentional safety forward space and celebrated loving atmosphere._

**Desired Benefits:** You will gain new ways to connect and bond with yourself and your fellow humans. You will be able to connect and explore your own relationship to this practice and all the yummy sensations possible. Opt in event meaning you only do what you feel comfortable with.

**NOTE:** We encourage everyone to have an open mind as this is a fun, open and explorative learning environment. We practice and review informed & ongoing consent practices with an emphasis on mutual opt in desire. name: HMU Academy: Making Scenes More Verbal
description:
Whether words are your only tool or just a sprinkle to your scene, you don't need to be a tongue twisting wordsmith to master mental domming

Whether you feel like you're a words smith or a horrendous public speaker - this class is for you! Lola Jean has a gift of gab, but she designed this class for even the timidest of speakers.

Whether words are your only tool or just a little sprinkle to your scene, you don't need to be a tongue twisting wordsmith to master mental domination. Verbal domination pulls from many of the same tactics as physical, only your words are the tools. Learn how to trap someone in their own mind and use their thoughts against them. When we play with mind the only bounds are that of our imagination. We can play in fantasy as much as we play in reality.

We will run the gamut from sweet to sadistic. In this class you will learn how to incorporate more verbal elements pre, during, and post-scene. Learn how to use someones words to inspire and further the scene, how to create a world that isn't there and how to find, expose and RELEASE an insecurity.

In addition to these overall concepts, you will walk away with several tactics and tools build to confuse, gain intel, and direct particular attention to the words you are saying. Lola Jean pulls well beyond typical domination approaches by weaving in learnings from the hypnosis, thespian, and journalism communities.

**FAQ: what should I bring?**

pen and paper for notetaking if you feel so inclined

**FAQ: what should I wear?**

whatever your heart desires

**FAQ: any skill pre-requisites? (i.e., is this for beginners, advanced, everyone?)**

for anyone - beginner or pro

**FAQ: can I attend solo, or do I need to come with a partner?**

solo or partnered!

**About Your Instructor**

Lola Jean is a Sex Educator, Fetish Wrestler, headmistress of 7 Days of Domination, and World Record Holder for Volume Squirting (solo.) providing the No Frills Sex Education we both need and deserve. Lola brings a refreshing understanding to sex, sexuality, and kink to push individuals past what they think they are capable of.

name: The Feels Queer edition 3: an event for LGBTQIA+ love seekers in BK
description:
An conscious dating event for all in search of deeper connection

**// about \\\\**

The Feels mixes time to meet and connect casually, with a 90 min facilitated portion. the format was built in partnership with Columbia University; it blends positive psychology, mindfulness, non violent communication + somatic awareness practices.

We believe that when you feel grounded + good in your body, an openness is available - and that space is ideal for connecting to others. We'll guide you to that place.

Data shows that 70% of all attendees walk out with the contact info for someone they're excited about + that 'the feels' is 2x more effective than a typical singles event.

**// the who \\\\**

this edition of the feels is for those who are ISO queer connection. It's open to all sexual orientations and gender identities within in the LGBTQIA+ community.

**// pls note \\\\**

**We do not offer refunds, as we're a small business and unable to accommodate refund or credit requests for future events.**

However, you‚Äôre welcome to transfer your ticket to the same event in the same category. For example, if you purchased a ticket for Queer 3, you can transfer or sell it to another person for that same event. You are responsible for finding a replacement. Once the switch is confirmed, please email us their name and email.

While we typically don't offer credits for future events, we‚Äôre more flexible with our Queer and ENM events as we continue to grow those communities.

Main space: class followed by guided practice, $0-30 depending on membership level

Gemini & Scorpio Loft, 267 Douglass St, 3rd fl (ADA accessible)

Official info: http://www.houseofscorpio.com/events.html

FB: https://www.facebook.com/events/2290053288009826

FL: https://fetlife.com/events/1610693

PL: https://plra.io/m/bedroom-badass-kinky-class-and-practice-rope-par

Socials: @gemini\_scorpio #houseofscorpio

Although rope seems like the obvious choice of bondage material to many, it is a very difficult medium for beginners to manipulate properly. We will make it easy for you by introducing basic safety and tool concepts before moving onto basic rope restraint techniques. These rope ties can be used decoratively and restrictively in a variety of positions, which can be customized to meet yours and your partners' physical abilities and personal goals.

Some topics to be covered:

\- Why rope?

\- Safety basics

\- Rope tension

\- Scene experience options

Demos & practice:

\- Connected tying demo/exercise

\- Beginner friendly Wrist & Ankle Cuffs with Options

\- Basic Chest Harness with Flexibility Options

\- Simple Full Body Harness

All BB classes are a mixture of lecture, hands-on experience, and dedicated Q&A time. After class, stay for dedicated practice & play time to help you solidify your skills, while our teacher remains available for guidance. Class and practice are in the main space, while the bar lounge is open 7pm-12am if you want to arrive early or leave late -- or just need a break. Always BYO practice items, where relevant, though we will always have a selection on hand.

Our teacher: Multithreaded/Mike (He/Him) Is a long time rope enthusiast with 10+ years of experience in the NYC Rope/Kink community. He enjoys exploring the power and versatility of rope as a creative act of communication, connection, and shared experience through an improvisational and observant style. He also enjoys sharing knowledge and helping others along their rope journey.¬†

Bedroom Badass is our series of workshops to take couples and individuals through various steps in opening up their relationships, or in exploring more adventurous sexual experiences. Whether you're a total novice or an old pro, each class has a range of information relevant to all experience levels.

\*Bedroom Badass happens on the second and fourth Wednesday of each month

\*\*HoS rules: HoS membership required; dress code, PAL or prior approval not required; Code of Conduct always applies; no photos except in the designated front area.

\*\*\*Plus: House of Scorpio Clubhouse.

Whatever your membership level, you are invited to use our space as your own for the night...as your clubhouse. name: POWER PLAY: Resistance & Brat Taming
description:
### Workshop: POWER PLAY | Resistance & Brats

**Hosted by Nix (the Sirenatrix)**

> This transformative edu-series on Power - designed for Dom(mes), subs, and switches - who wish to gain a deeper understanding of influence and surrender. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned veteran, this workshop will enhance your skills and scenes - and perhaps even your perspective.

Raising your voice in a domineering way isn‚Äôt the same as influencing your sub with a single whisper‚Äîtrue power tends to be subtle, grounded, intentional, and deeply connected. In **POWER PLAY**, you‚Äôll learn how to get someone‚Äôs entire mind, body, and soul on board with your desires. You‚Äôll learn to play with resistance, use your physicality, and make your presence felt down to the core. Every session will delve into a different facet of power dynamics. Embrace your role, refine your tools, and discover the depths of power exchange in a supportive educational environment.

Resistance & Brat Taming
------------------------

*   **The Dance of Resistance**: Understand the dynamics of resistance and how to use it to heighten the tension and excitement in your scenes.
*   **Taming the Brat**: Learn the art of brat taming, how to enjoy playful resistance, and transform it into a powerful exchange of energy.
*   **Power Struggles**: When you feel a ‚ÄúClash‚Äù between you and your counterpart, learn how to move the energy.

((Come to all four workshops or drop in for just one! ))

‚Äî-------------------------------------------------------------------------

#### Workshop Format:

*   **Discussion and Practical Exercises**: The workshop will include a mix of discussions and hands-on exercises. You'll have the chance to interact with others, practice communication techniques, and receive feedback.¬†
*   **Solo and Group Work**: You can come alone or with a partner. During the exercises, you'll have the opportunity to switch partners, which allows for practicing with familiar partners and new acquaintances. This helps simulate both established dynamics and pickup play scenarios.¬†
*   **Dress Code and Interactions**: Feel free to dress however you want, whether vanilla or ready to play. Expect to interact with others for the exercises, at least in terms of communication and light D/s. More physical play will be saved for the jam afterwards. We do not pair people up, and encourage guests to make friends and engage to their level of comfort ensuring that all are able to learn and grow. Couples can stay paired the whole time or practice with others if you so choose.
*   This workshop is open to all genders, sexual orientations, lifestyles, singles, and couples. All experience levels welcome. 18+.
*   Refunds must be requested 7 days prior to the event.¬†
*   Doors open at 7:30pm and close at 7:40 pm. Please be on time and text ahead if you are delayed.¬†
*   You are welcome to wear a mask throughout the duration of the event.

#### JAM After the Workshop:

Stick around for our jam session, exclusively open to workshop participants. During the jam, you'll have the opportunity to practice your new skills on dungeon furniture in a safe and supportive environment. Nix & Rrrob will be available to offer feedback or conduct activities that cement workshop learning. This is a unique chance to develop muscle memory through hands-on experience, working and learning together in a playful setting.

name: Cuddle Party
description:
**Cuddle Party** **1 - 4:30pm**

_Official Cuddle Party being hosted by Amanda Ananda for Pagans Paradise. Join our growing community of Cuddle Monsters!_

**Facilitated by** [Amanda Ananda](https://www.TheTantricMama.com) in collaboration with [Pagans Paradise](https://www.pagansparadise.com)

Ever just need a HUG? Want to meet new people?

Bring your Pj's and experience a sweet bubble of nourishing connection!!

At Cuddle Party we like to say that we are providing an EMPOWERING communication workshop, cleverly disguised as a pajama party!

Amanda is a Certified Cuddle Party Facilitator and is honored to host these events for our growing community of Cuddle Monsters! Come out and try this unique oxytocin bliss-filled experience and let your stresses melt away.

In our cozy, safe space, we will start with icebreakers and the rules of cuddling for the evening. You will gain practice in setting boundaries, expressing your NO and delivering it with compassion. Simultaneously, you will be encouraged to navigate our space with fearlessness and fun to ultimately discover your HEAVENS YES!

These are skills that can be taken back into your personal life and can drastically improve ALL of your relationships!

You will walk away with newfound confidence and unforgettable memories!

**The Experience:** This is an in-person workshop in a beautiful and private studio space in Manhattan. The workshop will include 3 hours of discussion & instruction where you will be able to receive and explore new techniques and positions.

**Intended Outcomes:** Think hugs, back rubs, foot rubs, nuzzling, head scratching, spooning and all forms of non-sexual snuggling!

*   Connection
*   Friendship
*   Community
*   Personal Development
*   Giving and Receiving Affection
*   Healing Touch
*   Laughter

**What to bring?**

*   Comfy Pajamas
*   Healthy Snacks to Share
*   Water Bottles
*   Blanket, Pillow or Plushies!

**Cost:**

*   Early Bird $30
*   Regular $40
*   At door $60

Doors open at 1pm, Welcome circle at 1:15 and the doors will be closed at that time, please be sure to come within that time frame.

NOTE: We encourage everyone to have an open mind as this is a fun, open and explorative learning environment. We practice and review informed & ongoing consent practices with an emphasis on mutual desire. This workshop is open to all gender identifications, sexuaI orientations and lifestyles. This is an alcohol and drug-free space and nonsexual environment.

This event is perfect and open for all experience levels. 18+ for workshops. Refunds must be requested 7 days prior to the event.

**About Your Facilitator:**

Amanda Ananda is an International Tantric Facilitator and Domestic Goddess of 2 outrageous young boys. Amanda has a diverse Tantrica background that allows for a unique, blissful and radiant experience to unfold in her workshops, online courses and sessions. Her techniques will help you to become embodied with simple-yet-profound, heartfelt tools that you can apply in your daily life.

name: HMU Academy: Strength & ConditiK!NK
description:
Join fitness coaches Alex & Lucca for an open-level strength & conditioning class with a k!nky twist. Ticket bundles available!

_This is a public event. HMU‚Äôs public events are 18+. Our vetted & private lists are 21+ only._

Do your arms get tired from flogging someone over and over?

Have trouble hoisting your favorite rope bunny?

Do your legs burn from squatting too much?

Just can‚Äôt wield that paddle all night long like you used to?

**Join coaches Alex & Lucca for an open-level strength & conditioning class with a kinky twist. Ticket bundles available for Sept 30 + Oct 28 + Nov 25 (last Monday of the month)!**

Doors Open: 6:30pm

Class Time: 7:00-8:00pm

Mingle: 8:00-8:45pm

This class is for everybody and every body! Modifications will be offered for each movement depending on your level of experience (with both fitness & with kink). Movements for this class will be kink-functional with a focus on enhancing endurance for impact related play. Please note, while there will be impact related movements, there will be no play during this class. We can't wait to see you there!

**Equipment to Bring:** This class will incorporate movements using kink implements including but not limited to floggers, paddles, whips, canes, etc. Bringing your own is highly encouraged, however there will be a limited number of items to borrow for class. Yoga mat for floor work, and a towel for sweat is suggested but not required. Water bottles are encouraged so you can have your water close by, water will be provided.

**About the instructors:**

**Alex (they/them):** Alex is a lifelong kinkster and joined the Hit Me Up community in 2022. As a nontraditional athlete living in a fat, QTPOC body, they strongly believe in the power of embodied movement and kink! Alex trains and coaches from a HAES (Health At Every Size) framework, and is committed to creating accessible, affirming spaces for their clients to reach their strength, movement and training goals. Alex is a Certified NASM and TI-PT (Trauma Informed) Personal Trainer.

**Lucca (they/them)**: Lucca has been a member of the Hit Me Up community since 2022 (you may know them as EJ). They have coached and competed in a wide variety of sports over the last 15 years including Long Distance Running, CrossFit, Olympic Weightlifting, and Roller Derby. Lucca has experience coaching all levels, and through this class they hope to bring their passions for kink and fitness together to help others achieve their goals in the streets as well as the sheets ;)

**Dress code:** Please wear clothing that you can comfortably move and sweat in. Feel free to dress in a way that makes you feel sexy (and strong)! Booty shorts, bodysuits, lingerie, and kink-wear more than welcome. Be sure whatever you're wearing doesn't restrict your movement. Topplessness is okay but there is **no full nudity!** Lower-half bits must remain covered. Close-toed shoes are required, sneakers or training shoes are strongly encouraged.

**Time:** Class will be an hour long and will begin at 7pm. We will have some time after class to cool down and mingle. Check out our upcoming [event schedule here](https://www.eventbrite.com/o/hit-me-up-69189357793) for more dates.

**Level:** This class is an open level class, we will be offering more accessible modifications and add-on options for difficulty with some exercises. Please listen to your body. Take rest and water breaks as needed! This is a judgment-free zone.

**Injuries:** Recent injuries should be cleared by your doctor/PT before attending class. Please let Coaches Alex & Lucca know about any recent or major injuries before class begins so we can go over any accommodations needed. If you have any questions about your injury feel free to reach out to us: [fatkidathleticsnyc@gmail.com](mailto:fatkidathleticsnyc@gmail.com) & [luccafinley@gmail.com](mailto:luccafinley@gmail.com)

**Pregnancy:** All pregnant and post natal clients should be cleared by their doctor, and must speak to Coaches before class to discuss any accommodations needed.

**Consent:** The rules of consent apply to this class. Please read Hit Me Up's full consent policy [here.](https://www.hitmeupnyc.com/consent) We reserve the right to ask individuals to leave class if deemed necessary for violating this policy.

**Public Event:** This event is open to members of the public who dress and behave appropriately. If you have previously been a member and been specifically notified that your membership was discontinued, please do not attend. If you're unsure, you're welcome to check your status by emailing hello@hitmupnyc.com. (If you are interested in joining our private events, you can always submit an [application](https://hitmeupnyc.com/join)).

**Waiver:** All class participants must sign a general waiver when they arrive. Please review it here.

**Refunds:** No refunds on ticket bundles. Refunds for any reason available for single date purchases.

\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*

**STAY IN TOUCH!**

If they wait until a few days before the event we cannot guarantee they will be able to be approved in time.**

name: Shamanic Bondage - Kundalini Rising & Rope Jam
description:
**Shamanic Bondage - Kundalini Rising & Rope Jam**

Ôªø**Workshop 7:30-9:45 pm - Jam 10pm-12am**

**_Address given in confirmation email additional info, this location has elevator access._**

Pagans Paradise Production Facilitated by [Snarfox](https://www.instagram.com/truxvulpe.wild.wellness)

Podcast on workshop Featured here [http://earthlydesire.com/ep58](http://earthlydesire.com/ep58) & [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/episode/3uFWweIfUk2QJOzOcHxCUb?si=1b1be5cb3b5c4f4f)

**_We are having a 2-part evening of indulgence and learning. Come for the workshop and stay for the Jam to practice what you learned and meet other like-minded folks!_**

**Are you ready to experience a divine merging of the er0tic and the spiritual?**

Step into the world of _Shamanic Bondage_, where the ancient practices of Shibari and Kundalini energy awaken your Eros and bring you into alignment with the divine.

Join us at Pagan's Paradise for an immersive and transformative journey where submission becomes sacred and energy rises from your root to your crown. **This is** a chance to explore the deeper realms of er0tic energy and self-awareness, to release old blockages, and to connect with your own divine essence.

**Event Highlights**

**Beginner's Rope Safety & Chaos Rope Ritual:** Learn basic knots and frictions in a way that focuses on grounding and divine submission, rather than restraint.

**Kundalini Activation & Chakra Alignment:** Awaken your Kundalini energy through breathwork and visualization, allowing your body‚Äôs energy to rise naturally and align with your highest self.

**Essential Oils & Plant Medicine:** Experience the transformative power of scent through anointing with sacred oils that anchor energy and enhance your journey.

**Soundscapes & Binaural Beats:** Guided by the soothing vibrations of low-frequency soundscapes, dive deep into the shamanic journey of self-discovery and energy awakening.

This session will leave you feeling grounded, empowered, and more deeply connected to both yourself and your partner. You‚Äôll walk away with tools to continue this practice on your own and integrate its benefits into your daily life.

**The Experience**

**Preparation:** Upon arrival, you will enter a sacred space with low lighting, incense, and essential oils. We‚Äôll start with an opening circle where each person can share their intentions for the evening.

**Breathwork & Kundalini Activation:** The first part of the evening will be dedicated to breathwork, guiding you through deep inhalations and exhalations to flex the perineum and channel energy from the base of your spine to the crown of your head. You'll feel the subtle rise of energy within your body.

**Rope Ritual:** You‚Äôll then engage in a rope ritual that focuses on using basic knots and chaos rope techniques. The goal is to create a container for surrender and submission‚Äînot just to your partner but also to the divine energy that flows through you.

**Shamanic Journey & Visualization:** This will be the heart of the experience. Through guided visualization, you will enter a meditative trance state supported by the healing properties of binaural beats and essential oils. You will feel your Kundalini energy spiral through your chakras, aligning and awakening your energy system.

**Integration:** At the end of the session, you‚Äôll have time to slowly reintegrate, untie, and reflect on your experience in a closing circle. This will be a time for sharing and grounding.

**Ongoing Benefits:** After the session, you will take home tools to continue this practice and stay connected to the energy that was raised. You‚Äôll learn how to maintain the alignment of your chakras and keep your Kundalini energy activated.

**For the Adventurous Souls**

*   This is not just an experience‚Äîit's a call to the soul. Come prepared to explore both the light and the shadow of your own energy, your body, and your connection to the divine. Whether you're a seasoned rope bunny or new to Shamanic practices, this offering is open to all who are ready to embrace their inner power and let the Kundalini rise.

**Benefits for Participants:**

*   **Emotional and Psychological Healing:** Combining these practices helps release emotional blockages and fosters a deeper connection with oneself and others‚Äã
*   **Enhanced Connection:** Learn tools and techniques to strengthen bonds with partners, creating a deeper sense of intimacy and trust.
*   **Therapeutic Properties:** Discover the calming and healing effects of essential oils and how they can support mental and physical health.
*   **Spiritual Growth:** Experience a guided shamanic journey that opens pathways to spiritual insights and personal transformation.

#### **Workshop Format:**

‚óè **Discussion and Practical Exercises**: The workshop includes a mix of theoretical discussion and hands-on practice, allowing you to learn and apply new skills in real-time.

‚óè **Solo and Group Work**: You can come alone or with a partner. During the exercises, you'll have the chance to practice with different people to simulate various dynamics.

‚óè **Dress Code**: Feel free to dress comfortably. You can wear anything from regular clothing to something more playful that suits your personal style.

#### **Jam After the Workshop:**

Stay for our jam session, exclusively open to workshop participants. During the jam, you'll have the opportunity to practice your new skills in a relaxed and supportive environment. This is a unique chance to cement these essential skills through hands-on experience, working and learning together in a playful setting.

#### **Pricing:**

‚óè **Workshop**: Plura+ $30, Classic $40

‚óè **Workshop and Jam**: Plura+ $55, Classic $75

#### **What to Bring:**

‚óè Your favorite ropes and tying tools (if you have them)

‚óè Open, curious minds

‚óè We will have rope for sale, $20 each for 35 feet

**NOTE:** We encourage everyone to have an open mind as this is a fun, open and explorative learning environment. We practice and review informed & ongoing consent practices with an emphasis on mutual opt in desire. This workshop is open to all gender identifications, sexual orientations, lifestyles, and we do not pair anyone as we honor genuine connections that arise in the evening.

This event is perfect and open for all experience levels.18+ for workshops. Refunds must be requested 7 days prior to the event. Doors open at 7:30pm and closes at 7:40 pm please be on time.

Any questions or concerns email PagansParadiseNYC@gmail.com

name: Bamboo, Body, and Rope
description:
This class will teach ties that incorporate a thin bamboo stick by tying it against the body. The ties are designed to introduce an additional element of restriction, when tying on the floor, utilizing the rigidness of the bamboo stick as opposed to the very pliable quality of rope.

We start the class by techniques to attach rope, body and bamboo together well, as this can be a challenge as bamboo is a slippery surface to tie on. Then specific ties, with themes like posture, exposure and torment, are taught. Detailing matters of placement of bamboo along the body, with body mechanics in mind, to achieve the desired effect.

This is a mixed level class suitable for students confident in fundamental tying techniques; You need to be able to tie single column tie well, without teacher support, and have prior experience in attending Shibari classes or workshops. It is not recommended as an introduction to shibari. Switching roles between ties is welcome if both partners are capable, but not mandatory.

#### Tickets sold as pairs. $120 per tying pair

_$40 deposit, $80 cash at the start of class_

description:
Aleah Black Book Release Dance Party @ Hit Me Up

_Public Event, 21+_

This Halloween, join **Aleah Black (Gendersauce)** to celebrate the release of their poetry book, **It Is Always A Circle**. Part poetry book, part coffee table art book, part spell book, It Is Always A Circle dives deep into the cycles that make up human experience. The poems track the reader‚Äôs journey from death into life, from despair into hope. Each page is filled with original linocuts, drawings, and poems. **Come for a book reading and signing with the author, and stay for a Halloween dance party.**

A portion of all profits from this event will be donated to ‚ÄúFor the Gworls,‚Äù an organization that provides rent and medical bill assistance to Black trans folks.

Part poetry book, part coffee table art book, part spell book, It Is Always A Circle dives deep into the cycles that make up human experience. The poems track the reader‚Äôs journey from death into life, from despair into hope. Each page is filled with original linocuts, drawings, and poems.

name: Weekend Intensive with Tamandua
description:
Tamandua visits NYC with Chuck as his model, to share his personal approach to Kinbaku, using some of his commonly used ties and techniques. The class concept will focus a lot on the ability to manage the intensity of a tie with subtle adjustments and calm assertiveness. During the workshop Tamandua will show some ties that when executed correctly, allow the top to easily control how intense they are for the bottom. The idea is to develop more confidence to play, especially in the territory of Semenawa ‚Äì tormenting rope. Guidance on how to tie and get tied more fluently, in a more natural feeling way, using body/rope management and communicative cues, will be a big part of the learning material for both tops/riggers and bottoms/models. Tamandua and his partner will explain how these factors play into the ‚Äòsoft skills‚Äô of rope bondage, and into the power exchange principles of erotically tormenting rope.

Technically, each tie is introduced through getting familiar with the basic building blocks which it is made up of. By learning the technical details of the harnesses used, and exploring how they feel and function under load of suspension, and simpler applications. As the final exercise each day, this collected knowledge gets put to the test when we enjoy a longer and (for top and bottom) more challenging tie.

#### Requirements:

*   Both tops/riggers AND bottoms/models need to have prior experience with suspension, and with TK/gote.
*   Riggers need to have learned how to make and lock suspension lines safely, and know these techniques by heart.
*   Riggers also need to be able to tie a solid TK, even though Tamandua‚Äôs variation will be taught in class, as this is a very high risk profile type of tie to learn for suspension. Therefore the workshop should not be one of your first experiences with TK suspension.
*   All these skills need to have been learned through an experienced instructor IRL (not video).
*   Everyone attending should be familiar with how to recognise signs of nerve damage, nerve impingement, and how to actively check for it during a tying session.
*   Please review your skills before purchasing tickets.

name: Under Tension
description:
This evening is about suspension lines beyond their suitability to suspend. Rather, the focus will be on their ability to create tension, and the possibilities for play that open up when shifting to this point of view. Being able to handle a suspension line means more control over pressure, physical intensity and access to more postures for restraint as opposed to without. They are also greatly helpful for the rope top in order to manipulate and access the bottoms body without using as much strength.

The workshop is suitable for anyone with some type of prior education in suspension lines, including those who are not quite ready to suspend, but nonetheless want to familiarize themselves with using suspension points as a tool. For those already suspending this class can still be very beneficial in order to step back from routine and add more complexity to their tying sessions.

While ties will be rather simple, basic techniques like attaching a suspension line to a harness, or locking off will not be taught. Therefore, it is not recommended that this is your very first introduction to suspension lines. Please make sure that you have received tuition in basic techniques prior to attending. Being able to tie a single column well is fundamental for all of the exercises. Ask someone experienced for feedback if unsure.

4-5 jute ropes and 1 shorter rope will be needed.

name: Hit Me Up: Tie Me Down Rope Jam
description:
Whether you're a skilled rope artist, an experienced rope bunny, or brand new and just curious, we welcome you!

**Hit Me Up: Tie Me Down Rope Jam**

Whether you're a skilled rope artist, an experienced rope bunny, or brand new and just curious, we welcome you! You may be tethered down, or you may get to fly with us. It also might get a little bit nerdy, because, hey, rope people.

Please note that **this is not a class**! Feel free to get to know each other and share your knowledge or tie with someone new.

**Agenda**

**7.15pm:** Opening circle and introductions will begin, so please arrive by then.

**7.30pm:** Beginners corner for folks. This will be facilitated by either Syd or Trixie and will cover some rope basics.

**Additional info**

*   bring your own rope if you have it (there will be some to share if you don't)
*   bring your own shears
*   if you plan to suspend, you need your own rigging equipment
*   this is an all level event!
*   all attendees need a ticket whether self-tying, coming solo, or paired.

Your rope artist hosts for the evening:

**Trixie LaPointe**: [Mistress Trixie LaPointe](https://twitter.com/MistresLaPointe) is a rope artist and disciplinarian based in NYC. She has been exploring rope and her dominance since late 2017. The proud proprietor of her own studio space La Maison Priv√©e, where she holds various sessions as well as small classes and events.

**Sydona Rogue**: [Sydona](https://twitter.com/sydonarogue) is a Brooklyn-based rope artist, movement practitioner, and photographer who uses her training and performance experience in classical dance to inspire her ventures into experimental and experiential art of all forms. She was first introduced to the New York kink scene in 2018, and has been deepening her practice as a rope performer, educator, and facilitator ever since. In that time she has performed at events by House of Yes, House of X, House of Gemini and Scorpio, Seeking Haven, Hit Me Up!, Le Wand, Nuit des Cordes, and The Box. She's committed to creating safer kink spaces, educational opportunities, beautiful art, and connection to like-minded folks, for the sake of \*joy\* in ropes.

Want to see what other events are coming up? Join our [public newsletter](https://www.hitmeupnyc.com/newsletter) and follow us on insta (@hitmeupnycity)

name: The Feels NY ed 39: a mindful singles event in Brooklyn, NY
description:
An IRL experience for those who are thoughtfully approaching dating.

**// about \\\\**

'The Feels' mixes time to meet and connect casually, with a 90 min facilitated portion. the format was built in partnership with Columbia University; it blends positive psychology, mindfulness, non violent communication + somatic awareness practices.

We believe that when you feel grounded + good in your body, an openness is available - and that space is ideal for connecting to others. We'll guide you to that place.

Data shows that 70% of all attendees walk out with the contact info for someone they're excited about + that 'the feels' is 2x more effective than a typical singles event.

Ticket cost includes unlimited light bites, wine, and non alcoholic beverages.

Read about us in the [NYTimes](https://www.nytimes.com/2023/10/02/style/eye-contact-dating-intimacy-non-monogamous.html), [Thrillist](https://www.thrillist.com/lifestyle/new-york/the-feels-dating-nyc) and/or [Philly Mag](https://www.inquirer.com/life/dating-app-millenials-gen-z-feels-allie-hoffman-20231224.html).

**// the who \\\\**

this edition of the feels is for those who identify as ISO a monogamous(ish) + hetero pairing.

the events are inclusive of ages 25 - 55; if you fall outside those ranges, please know we're working on age segmented 'feels' for you!

name: HMU Tie Me Down Advanced: fLoOr TiEs aRe EaSy
description:
‚ÄúFLoOr tIeS ArE eAsY‚Äù A Class of Definitely Not easy Floor Ties . An exploration of choosing the hard route.

**‚ÄúFLoOr tIeS ArE eAsY‚Äù A Class of Definitely Not easy Floor Ties - ADVANCED**

With complicated patterns and challenging positions, this class serves as a reminder to both tops and bottoms that you don't need uplines to make rope hard.

This class will explore two complex floor-based shapes--students will see each shape demonstrated in full and be given plenty of time to try out and play with the shapes themselves. This is an advanced rope class for both rigger and model, with the intention to challenge what we usually think of as "difficult" rope, by taking familiar structures and making them \*more\*.

**About Your Instructor**

In March of 2018 Sydona found her way into the NYC kink scene and never looked back. Since then, she's immersed herself into honing her rope practice, perhaps obsessively. She currently works full time as a nightlife performer, bondage artist, photographer, and creator. In these past several years she's traveled both within the U.S. and internationally for rope opportunities, as a performer, as a student, and more recently as an educator. Previous to 2020, Syd trained and worked as a professional modern and contemporary dancer, and is proud of the way she melds her thirteen odd years of experience as a movement artist into her current practice.

**Frequently Asked Questions**

FAQ: what should I bring?

A basic floor rope kit--at least six bundles of rope and a cutting tool

FAQ: what should I wear?

Whatever you feel comfy and can move in! Anything from yoga clothes to undies.

FAQ: any skill pre-requisites? (i.e., is this for beginners, advanced, everyone?)

Rigger prerequisites: any single and double column tie, basic frictions, some experience building complex structures and following multi-step patterns, confident in rope communication skills, knowledge of safety and risk in rope

Bottom prerequisites: confident in-rope communication skills, knowledge of safety and risk in rope

Please note that this is an advanced rope class, and anyone who does not meet these prerequisites will be asked to observe.

FAQ: can I attend solo, or do I need to come with a partner?\*This is a partnered class!

For BIPOC and SWorkers - use cope EQUITY at checkout for a discount.

name: Totally Normal: A Co-Dependent Trans Friendship Musical
description:
Staged reading of a musical comedy about Tabitha + Squid, broke stoner besties facing the everyday struggles of trans life in Oakland, CA.

Join us at Opera America's Marc A. Scorca Hall for TOTALLY NORMAL: A Co-Dependent Trans Friendship Musical. Tabitha and Squid are broke stoner roommates who do everything together‚Äîlike running the illegal, weed-fueled Hotbox Salon out of their apartment in Oakland, CA. Can their business survive Squid‚Äôs problem drinking, Tabitha‚Äôs risky hookup with their building‚Äôs super, and the everyday struggles of working class trans life? No spoilers, but it‚Äôs gonna get messy!

In this brand new show, trans people aren‚Äôt punchlines‚Äîthey _deliver_ punchlines. Combining the spirit of groundbreaking queer musicals like _Falsettos_ and _Fun Home_ with the broad, raunchy humor of _Avenue Q_, TOTALLY NORMAL is a loving, hilarious tribute to the humor and humanity at the heart of trans friendships.

Tickets are pay what you can, with a suggested donation of $15.

**Cast**

Tabitha: Blanca Del Loco

Squid: Ellie van Amerongen

Buffy/Lieutenant: Sushma Saha

Earnest/Guncle: Dontalle Sylvester

Chad, Chorebitch1997, Director, Phantom Fairy: Sam Nackman

Trent, Gretchen, Commander, Creep, Phantom Fairy: Sammy Overton

**Creative team**

Director: Mika Kauffman

Music Director: Sid Quinsaat

Stage Manager: Hannahjo Anderson

Lyrics, Music + Book: Reina Bracha

Music: Matt Fukui Grandy

Book: Kelly Anneken

For more info about the show, including more ways to get involved, visit [www.totallynormalmusical.com](https://www.totallynormalmusical.com/).

name: CUFFING SEASON - Speed Dating (& Friending) at TOASTED!
description:
Make a new friend or flirt with a new honey!! For ages 28 - 42 ish

Are you exhausted of dating apps and awkward first dates that lead nowhere? If you're over the world of online dating and want real, face-to-face connections, we invite you to CUFFING SEASON, a speed dating experience designed to foster both connections of friendship and flirting.

Join us for a fresh, fun twist on speed dating, where the vibe is relaxed, playful, and all about making genuine connections. Whether you're here to find a new friend or spark a romantic connection, you‚Äôll enjoy an evening of meaningful conversations and laughter.

**Here‚Äôs what you can expect:**

**Warm-up Social Hour:** We kick off the evening with casual social activities to break the ice. You‚Äôll bond over shared hobbies, interests, and goals‚Äîwhether you‚Äôre here for friendship or dating, there‚Äôs no pressure.

**Speed Dating (and Friending) Rounds:** Ready to make some connections? You‚Äôll rotate through quick, fun conversations, deciding if there‚Äôs a spark for friendship or flirting. No awkward silences here‚Äîwe keep the energy light and playful, and provide conversation starters!

We aim to create an experience with no pressure or stress‚Äîjust real conversations in a fun, relaxed setting. After the event, you‚Äôll receive a list of your mutual matches (whether for friendship or something more) within 2-3 days. Who knows? You might leave with a new BFF or your next date!

**Who‚Äôs This For?**

If you‚Äôre tired of endless scrolling and ready for real connections, this event is for you. Whether you're looking to make friends, find a date, or just meet new people in a chill environment, come hang out with us at Toasted and see where the night takes you.

**Tickets: $20**

Hope to see you there!!

**We ask that all guests arrive by 7:20** to participate in this event!

Email Amanda@alayarose.com with any questions, comments or feedback!

_Hosted by Amanda Rue, an event producer and pleasure coach located here in Newburgh, NY. Her work invites us to release shame and come into a more conscious connection with pleasure and connection. She also performs under the pseudonym, Rev.Rucifer and promotes practices of sacred sexuality through workshops, events and private sessions, including Sensual Reiki and Reiki Bondage, a BDSM-inspired healing practice._

_She has helped thousands of people from all over the world uncover their pleasure within and develop practices that cultivate personal safety, care and respect. Amanda has made it her life's work to help individuals, organizations and companies to embrace all that life has to offer through meaningful dialogue, transformative change and the pursuit of pleasure. Her work has been featured in Forbes, Cosmopolitan, The New York Times, Seasons 1 & 2 of Sex Life on EPIX just to name a few._

name: The High-Value Man Is the Emotionally Intelligent One
description:
Learn how emotional intelligence makes a man truly high value, building deeper connections and self-awareness for life and relationships.

**Hosted by Courtney Brame**

**WORKSHOP:**

This workshop breaks down the modern concept of a "High-Value Man," focusing not on superficial qualities but on the strength of emotional intelligence. Men will explore key topics such as emotional availability, self-awareness, and communication‚Äîlearning to navigate relationships and life with greater depth and authenticity. Through guided exercises, you'll build tools for emotional regulation and discover what it means to be a truly "high-value" man from the inside out.

**SOCIAL:**

Come for the workshop, stay for the social. Enjoy drink specials, a discounted pop-up shop, and a beautiful garden patio perfect for mixing and mingling.

**OUR PRESENTER:**

Courtney Brame is the founder of Selfed, a platform that fosters emotional wellness for men through open dialogue, yoga, and self-inquiry. A Yoga-Informed Emotional Wellness Practitioner, Courtney‚Äôs work challenges societal norms around masculinity and emotional expression. He advocates for a deeper, more intentional approach to emotional intelligence, helping men live authentically and develop healthier relationships.

**ABOUT SHAG:**

SHAG is a space free of judgment for your unique sexual identity, an environment built on mutual respect, where all can feel welcome to discover tools and accessories to support a variety of fantasies and desires. When you come to SHAG, no matter your sexual preference, gender identification, age or ethnicity, whether you‚Äôre sporting tattoos or mom jeans, you‚Äôll find a welcoming and friendly atmosphere. You can feel comfortable asking questions and receiving reliable information from our knowledgeable staff as you explore what makes you tick. name: The Feels NY ed 40: a mindful singles event in Brooklyn, NY
description:
An IRL experience for those who are thoughtfully approaching dating.

**// about \\\\**

'The Feels' mixes time to meet and connect casually, with a 90 min facilitated portion. the format was built in partnership with Columbia University; it blends positive psychology, mindfulness, non violent communication + somatic awareness practices.

We believe that when you feel grounded + good in your body, an openness is available - and that space is ideal for connecting to others. We'll guide you to that place.

Data shows that 70% of all attendees walk out with the contact info for someone they're excited about + that 'the feels' is 2x more effective than a typical singles event.

Ticket cost includes unlimited light bites, wine, and non alcoholic beverages.

Read about us in the [NYTimes](https://www.nytimes.com/2023/10/02/style/eye-contact-dating-intimacy-non-monogamous.html), [Thrillist](https://www.thrillist.com/lifestyle/new-york/the-feels-dating-nyc) and/or [Philly Mag](https://www.inquirer.com/life/dating-app-millenials-gen-z-feels-allie-hoffman-20231224.html).

**// the who \\\\**

this edition of the feels is for those who identify as ISO a monogamous(ish) + hetero pairing.

the events are inclusive of ages 25 - 55; if you fall outside those ranges, please know we're working on age segmented 'feels' for you!

![](https://img.evbuc.com/https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.evbuc.com%2Fimages%2F739558959%2F2042575305683%2F1%2Foriginal.20240409-173323?h=740&w=1200&auto=format%2Ccompress&q=75&sharp=10&s=75c13d52cf34ec70bf3b6e35324c44e5)

**// pls note \\\\**

**We do not offer refunds, as we're a small business and unable to accommodate refund or credit requests for future events.**

However, you‚Äôre welcome to transfer your ticket to the same event in the same category. For example, if you purchased a Female ticket for NY Feels 12, you can transfer or sell it to another female attendee for that same event. You are responsible for finding a replacement. Once the switch is confirmed, please email us their name and email.

While we typically don't offer credits for future events, we‚Äôre more flexible with our Queer and ENM events as we continue to grow those communities.

**For further questions on ticket transfers please refer to our** [**FAQ page**](https://catchthefeels.co/faqs/)**.**

### **For the adventurous, experimentalist, and curious who enjoy a healthy dose of the unknown, join us for YUMMY.**

_It is important to note the following so that your experience is as full as it can be._

**BLACK AF + BIPOC**

Our Founders and Producers are BLACK AF. The majority of our production team and cast represent BIPOC people from all over the world. We center the black experience in our performance art and immersive experiences. We bring focus to BIPOC. And we welcome and celebrate everyone of all identities, races, nationalities, and ethnicities!

**SEX POSITIVE & LOVE STYLES**

We welcome all love styles to use us as the best date night destination. Whether you're monogamous, nonmonogamous, or polyamorous, our community includes those of all love styles and is sex-positive. Whether it's the first date, the 10th, or you're celebrating a milestone anniversary, we'd love to have you join us.

**QUEER & STRAIGHT PEOPLE**

Our entire company and those we work with include many from all aspects and identities of the Queer community (LGBTQIA2S+) All are welcomed into our community no matter who you are or who you're into.

**KINK & BDSM**

Our leadership team and production team are all BDSM and Kink practitioners, lifestylers, and/or professionals. While select feature performers may be Vanilla, our experiences, and shows are immersed in all kinds of subversive kinks if you want to see them. However, vanilla is a flavor, and those who identify as such can have an equally enjoyable experience. (Select BDSM events and play parties, due to their nature, are vetted and/or invite-only.)

**SHADOWS OF INCLUSIVITY**

There are many areas of inclusivity any person or organization can choose to focus on. We are also keenly aware that due to trending or more socially acceptable forms of inclusivity and diversity, marginalized and oppressed people sometimes fall further into the shadows of inclusivity. Noting this, we also tend to cast and produce on the fringes and within the shadows often overlooked.

TESTIMONIALS & SUCCESS STORIES
------------------------------

Here are some heartwarming stories from people who had their initial doubts but decided to take a chance on Tantra Speed Date¬Æ!

![](https://img.evbuc.com/https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.evbuc.com%2Fimages%2F457254589%2F287337217873%2F1%2Foriginal.20230228-190710?h=740&w=1200&auto=format%2Ccompress&q=75&sharp=10&s=db5a326c89ad7562576a1e6bb63aacc7)

### "_We couldn't have imagined how our lives would be impacted by attending Tantra Speed Date¬Æ. Our connection was soft and sweet, what we both describe as the 'best first date of our lives.' Meeting in such a vulnerable and safe environment was the perfect catalyst for creating an authentic connection. Having that as the base for our first meetings laid the foundation for honesty and trust._"

‚Äî Jihan & Joseph

![](https://img.evbuc.com/https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.evbuc.com%2Fimages%2F412345379%2F287337217873%2F1%2Foriginal.20221220-155143?h=740&w=1200&auto=format%2Ccompress&q=75&sharp=10&s=d76533d74b34f82e4b471c0ad89824a6)

More Than Just A Speed Dating Event
-----------------------------------

At Tantra Speed Date¬Æ, our mission goes beyond just helping you find your next match.

We're committed to helping you bring more connection into your love life wherever you go!

That's why our guided exercises have a "secret" purpose; they **enhance your relationship skills in subtle, yet powerful ways...**

So you'll walk away not only with matches but also with a new level of confidence in yourself as both a person and a partner!

Plus, you'll learn how to bring more presence into **_all_** your interactions going forward...

Which will allow you to start engaging with your future dates in a way that's **fun, authentic, and even healing.**

So if you were wondering why singles have dubbed this event as "Yoga for your Love Life"...

Well, now you know!

![](https://img.evbuc.com/https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.evbuc.com%2Fimages%2F594664049%2F1493533057%2F1%2Foriginal.20230911-041813?h=740&w=1200&auto=format%2Ccompress&q=75&sharp=10&s=4f1b9190af4ccd9783a37da870c357b2)

FAQ
---

Don't see your question answered below? Check out the [FAQ on our website](https://tantrany.com/speed-dating/?aff=4ebfaq) (bottom of page)!

### What is Tantra, and why "Tantra" Speed Date?

Forget those wild myths and blockbuster misunderstandings; Tantra is more about connection, fun, and being present than anything risqu√©. Imagine it as the art of "relationship yoga," blending age-old practices with a twist of joy and mindfulness. Through exercises like breathing, meditating, and maybe even a little dancing, you'll find yourself more in tune with those around you. It's like a social superpower for making genuine connections, and trust us, it's a blast! After all, we find this level of presence is exactly what's missing from most dating encounters today. Why just talk when you can laugh, connect, and explore together?

### What does this style of dating look like?

Picture this: You'll form two fun-filled circles of fellow daters. The men make up the outer ring, and the women form the inner ring; so that you're paired off with a friendly face across from you. Together, you'll dive into engaging and heartfelt mini-dates (we call them 'dating stations') that last just long enough to spark a connection. After each experience, you'll bring your hands into a cheerful 'Namaste', share a quick thank you, and then ‚Äî whoosh! ‚Äî off to the next exciting meeting. Keep circling around, and by the end, you'll have met everyone.

### What kinds of exercises will I do?

No clich√©d icebreakers here! Our exercises are all about authentic human connection, not cheesy romance. We're talking engaging dialogue, light partner yoga, movement/dance, heartwarming eye-gazing, and even some gentle hand-holding. It's a delightful mix that goes beyond the mundane 'what's your job' chatter.

The coolest part? Every exercise is wrapped around a positive relating skill. So, not only will you have a blast, you'll be building real relationship skills too! And remember consent, you're the boss of how you participate. It's all about fun and connection in a way that feels good for you.

### What if one of the exercises is not my cup of tea?

Thanks for asking! While the exercises are straightforward and fun, you are always 100% at choice for how you wish to participate. If you find an exercise that doesn't work for you, then--just like in yoga--you have the option to modify, or completely opt out. Everyone is encouraged to participate at their own comfort level, and our facilitators do a fabulous job demonstrating what that looks like, so it feels good for everyone.

### So how does this all add up to dating?

Great question! Think of it as a refreshing twist on the traditional dating scene. You'll get to interact, laugh, and connect with others, and then decide who you'd like to get to know better. We put a fun spin on things by letting the ladies take the lead in choosing; they'll place one of their beads in each man's pouch that they want to connect with. They'll get a feel for the guys' personalities and presence, while the men are guided on how to be grounded and open-hearted. Afterwards, either party can contact the other. It's all about letting connections unfold naturally.

### What is the schedule?

*   **Doors Open**: Right at the start time, we'll check you in, hand over your dating materials, and give you a playing card for a super fun Ice Breaker game. You've got until the stations begin to mix and mingle!
*   **20 minutes in**: Time to let in folks from the waiting list, making sure everything's balanced and ready to roll.
*   **30 minutes in**: Ice Breaker game wraps up, and the doors close. Now the real fun begins as we kick off the event. Be sure to check in before this time, or you'll miss out on all the excitement! (Running late or need to cancel? Check our policy below.)
*   **End of the Night**: You'll feel the warm glow of connection and may not want it to end. While we'll gently nudge you toward the door, it's common for guests to join together for dinner, continuing the connections and conversations. Who knows? Your night might just be getting started!

### What should I wear?

Think comfort with a touch of your best self! You'll be sitting and also moving, so choose an outfit that lets you feel relaxed but still sharp. Just remember, it's a date, so grooming matters. And go easy on strong scents; some people are sensitive.

### Is there food or drink at the event?

We usually don't serve food or drinks (unless it's a special event), so feel free to bring a water bottle. Snacks might be good for before or after, but check with the venue, as some don't allow food. As tempting as a quick bite during the event might be, you'll want all your attention on your dates. And remember, alcohol is a no-go, so please arrive with a clear and ready mind.

### How many dates will I have?

Get ready for a lively evening with up to 20 opportunities to connect! Our events typically max out at around 40 singles. Assuming a balanced mix, you'll have the chance to spark a connection with up to 20 different people. And, we're all about quality not quantity. You'll find each moment meaningful as you dive into engaging exchanges with others who, just like you, are looking to explore connection and authenticity.

### What is the gender balance at the event?

We don't believe in leaving anyone out of the fun, so we do our best to aim for an equal gender balance. Of course, it isn't always 100% under our control--even our matchmaking powers have their limits. But so far, just about every event has been sold out. And since we have an equal number of tickets per gender, they've all had a solid mix of singles ready to mingle! (We also occasionally use door sales magic to balance the gender too.)

### What if I don't match with anyone?

As many of our attendees say, "I don't even care if I match with anyone, this was amazing!" That said, we geek out on data. Our statistics say there is a 94.09% chance you'll match with AT LEAST one person. But if for whatever reason the probability fails you, we've got you covered. Your next ticket will be free!

### What is the age range?

Some events have a suggested age range (noted in the title and description) and some are open to all ages. Whether you're a little outside the range or just curious about meeting people within it, you're welcome here.

Our most popular events are open to all ages, drawing a vibrant and diverse crowd. Singles 30-45 tend to be the largest group. Followed by folks 45+ and then 20s. And while age might be a curiosity, what truly sets our events apart is the connection experience.

But here's the thing. It's more than just about the dates. And this is what makes Tantra Speed Date¬Æ unique. Singles everywhere rave about how the experience itself can be quite transformative, regardless of their matches. Why? Simply engaging consciously with other singles in a positive and structured way promotes more healthy relationships. And it just plain feels good to connect with real people. You likely have never experienced dating in such a fun and comfortable way. You'll gain confidence, pick up new skills, and will likely start to attract more quality people into your life. That's what our participants say over and over again!

### Will there be enough people?

Don't let low RSVPs in one spot fool you. Our events often sell out faster than you can say "Namaste," and often with a waiting list. We're keen to promote across various platforms, and they don't all show the same love. Rest assured, we make sure there's always a crowd worth your while. So come on down; your next amazing connection could be just one RSVP away!

### Do I have to be single to attend?

Ah, the modern relationship landscape‚Äîa tapestry of statuses! While you don't need to be 'single' in the traditional sense, you do need to be in a space where romantic connections are possible. If you're already committed and not open to new love, you may want to consider our couples events. But if you find your heart's door ajar, even just a smidge‚Äîor if you're teetering on the edge of 'ready to date'‚Äîthis could be the perfect space to explore what's possible. Consider this your invitation to a playground of connection, perfect for testing the waters!

### Is this a heterosexual event and is there a Queer/LGBTQ Tantra Speed Date?

Diversity is the spice of life, and we're cooking up all kinds of flavors! This classic version of Tantra Speed Date¬Æ is primarily designed for men-seeking-women and women-seeking-men. In this setup you'll find yourself in one of two gendered circles‚Äîone for men and one for women. You'll rotate through up to 20 dates with members of the opposite gender. But don't fret, fabulous queer friends! We also host Queer Tantra Speed Date events in select cities. So if you're looking for a rainbow connection, keep an eye on our website to see when we're bringing that magic to a city near you!

### What is your cancellation/refund policy?

We get it‚Äîlife's a whirlwind! If you find yourself having to back out, no worries. Here's the lowdown: cancel 24 hours or more ahead and you'll get a refund or transfer, no fuss. If you're within that 24-hour window, or fashionably late and miss the opening ceremony, shoot us an email and we'll graciously "speed date" your ticket to the next event as a one-time courtesy. So keep your plans as flexible as a yoga pose, and communicate with us before the event kicks off. No refunds or transfers after the chimes ring and the magic starts!

### Can I sign up with my friend?

Absolutely! We often have Bring-A-Friend ticket discounts! So thanks for sharing Tantra Speed Date¬Æ with your friends! However, do be sure to fill out their name and their email address on the attendee form. Otherwise we will not be able to check them in properly, and they will not receive all the wonderful matches they'll make at the event. If we had a nickel for how many times your friends email us wondering where their matches went... well, you get the picture. So please. Do your friends a solid and fill in their proper details.

### More Questions?

Contact us at **help@tantrany.com** we'll be happy to tell you more about this event or others.

name: Cuddle Party
description:

_Official Cuddle Party being hosted by Amanda Ananda for Pagans Paradise. Join our growing community of Cuddle Monsters!_

**Facilitated by** [Amanda Ananda](https://www.TheTantricMama.com) in collaboration with [Pagans Paradise](https://www.pagansparadise.com)

Ever just need a HUG? Want to meet new people?

Bring your Pj's and experience a sweet bubble of nourishing connection!!

At Cuddle Party we like to say that we are providing an EMPOWERING communication workshop, cleverly disguised as a pajama party!

Amanda is a Certified Cuddle Party Facilitator and is honored to host these events for our growing community of Cuddle Monsters! Come out and try this unique oxytocin bliss-filled experience and let your stresses melt away.

In our cozy, safe space, we will start with icebreakers and the rules of cuddling for the evening. You will gain practice in setting boundaries, expressing your NO and delivering it with compassion. Simultaneously, you will be encouraged to navigate our space with fearlessness and fun to ultimately discover your HEAVENS YES!

These are skills that can be taken back into your personal life and can drastically improve ALL of your relationships!

You will walk away with newfound confidence and unforgettable memories!

**The Experience:** This is an in-person workshop in a beautiful and private studio space in Manhattan. The workshop will include 3 hours of discussion & instruction where you will be able to receive and explore new techniques and positions.

**Intended Outcomes:** Think hugs, back rubs, foot rubs, nuzzling, head scratching, spooning and all forms of non-sexual snuggling!

*   Regular $40

Doors open at 1pm, Welcome circle at 1:15 and the doors will be closed at that time, please be sure to come within that time frame.

NOTE: We encourage everyone to have an open mind as this is a fun, open and explorative learning environment. We practice and review informed & ongoing consent practices with an emphasis on mutual desire. This workshop is open to all gender identifications, sexuaI orientations and lifestyles. This is an alcohol and drug-free space and nonsexual environment.

This event is perfect and open for all experience levels. 18+ for workshops. Refunds must be requested 7 days prior to the event.

Amanda Ananda is an International Tantric Facilitator and Domestic Goddess of 2 outrageous young boys. name: The Feels Level 2 ed 2: a curated IRL dating experience
description:
An afternoon experience for those who are veryyyyy thoughtfully approaching dating, for Level 1 alum only.

**// about \\\\**

'The Feels', level 2 is an experience exclusively for 'feels' alumni. it aims to bring you into thoughtful connection with values-aligned singles over the course of a long Saturday afternoon.

what makes level 2 different!?

1\. instead of 3 hours, we're going to be together for 4;

2\. we'll be altering the format to focus more intensely on time in each pair;

3\. you'll have a chance to go deeper in each pair;

4\. we'll be curating the pairs based on inputs we'll receive from you prior to the event. in other words, we'll make the pairs for you! we'll be basing who you get paired with, on our 3+1 pillars theory (more info on that below);

4\. there will be time to connect to anyone in the group outside our 'assignments' who you might be feeling called to via a wild card round.

**// the who \\\\**

this edition of the 'feels' is for those who identify as ISO a monogamous(ish) + hetero pairing.

this edition of the 'feels' is ONLY for those who have been to 1 or more installments of the event already.

this edition is for those who are between the ages of 25 - 55.

**// the 3+1 pillars \\\\**

we believe that connection is different than compatibility; we're aiming for both, but optimizing for the latter. to that, we'll be basing pairs on:

1\. values alignment: do you + your pair share core values?

2\. vision for your life: do you + your pair share a vision for what you want from life?

3\. comms: do you + your pair share communication style(s) + needs?

\+ we'll be asking you about preferred age range(s).

![](https://img.evbuc.com/https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.evbuc.com%2Fimages%2F800537789%2F2042575305683%2F1%2Foriginal.20240702-202808?h=740&w=1200&auto=format%2Ccompress&q=75&sharp=10&s=98c607498a1b990eaecf5602a5a2936c)

![](https://img.evbuc.com/https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.evbuc.com%2Fimages%2F739558959%2F2042575305683%2F1%2Foriginal.20240409-173323?h=740&w=1200&auto=format%2Ccompress&q=75&sharp=10&s=75c13d52cf34ec70bf3b6e35324c44e5)

**// pls note \\\\**

**We do not offer refunds, as we're a small business and unable to accommodate refund or credit requests for future events.**

However, you‚Äôre welcome to transfer your ticket to the same event in the same category. For example, if you purchased a Female ticket for NY Feels 12, you can transfer or sell it to another female attendee for that same event. You are responsible for finding a replacement. Once the switch is confirmed, please email us their name and email.

While we typically don't offer credits for future events, we‚Äôre more flexible with our Queer and ENM events as we continue to grow those communities.

**For further questions on ticket transfers please refer to our** [**FAQ page**](https://catchthefeels.co/faqs/)**.**

We know this experience is not cheap. if helpful: professional matchmakers charge tens of thousands of dollars; we're attempting here to harness the power of a thousands-strong alumni community filled w values-aligned singles, and offer an opportunity to be in curated connection. we make no guarantees as it relates to the matches, but we can promise you'll spend an afternoon immersed in a toolkit for how we might better date + relate moving forward.

Tickets close 36 - 72 hours prior to the event to give us time to do the pairings.

**// our partners \\\\**

special thanks to

![](https://img.evbuc.com/https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.evbuc.com%2Fimages%2F752392459%2F2042575305683%2F1%2Foriginal.20240425-162300?h=740&w=1200&auto=format%2Ccompress&q=75&sharp=10&s=263d077d1a7adf928276526f896fb679)

**email:** [contact@shivaj.com](mailto:contact@ShivaJ.com)

Thank you so much for kindly considering this

The first couple of solo males will be "confirmed automatically"... after that, if registering alone, you will be placed on a waiting list. Your space in the event will be confirmed as soon as a matching solo female registers. If you are unable to be confirmed, your money will be fully refunded electronically the day after the event. **A NOTE ABOUT GENITAL CONTACT:** There is no direct "Manual-Genital Massage" in this workshop... that is the specialization taught in a different course. However there is some "Genital Brushing"... where a part of the giver's body (for example, a forearm or a thigh) may brush with light to moderate pressure across the genitals of the receiver. This happens at very specific points in the massage sequence to activate & circulate the receivers sexual energy throughout "their own body". As with "any" exercise in this workshop, this is totally optional (as stated above) and if you desire not to experience this, the technique can be easily modified to fit your individual boundaries.

**\*ALL SOLO PARTICIPANTS (Female & Male):** This class is "gender-balanced" and usually filled with about 50-60% "SOLO" male & female participants.

**ALL SOLO PARTICIPANTS** will be pairing up with a different solo participant of the opposite gender for each morning and afternoon session (3-4 hours in length) throughout the workshop. This is particularly helpful for learning the correct dynamics for effectively applying the techniques on different people (for example certain techniques need to be adjusted to be applied on a tall person as opposed to a shorter person etc.).

**NOTE:** For the workshop to run smoothly, if you begin the workshop as a "Solo" participant (male or female) you will need to remain in that status throughout the duration of the workshop and change to a new practice partner of the opposite gender at every rotation point (every 3-4 hours).

**IMPORTANT:** if you desire to work with a same gender partner you will need to attend as a pair. We truly wish it weren't the case, but unfortunately after many tries, it has turned out be too logistically complicated to accomplish within the rotating group of solo participants üôèüíó

**SAME SEX COUPLES** are warmly invited to attend as a pair.

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**

*   This is a "heart centered....touch positive....super-fun"... and information-rich workshop.
*   All personal boundaries will be Lovingly respected!
*   All exercises are optional or "negotiable".
*   You are welcome to wear a Covid mask if you wish.
*   Open to SINGLES & COUPLES.
*   COUPLES may do all exercises together if they wish.
*   SAME SEX COUPLES are welcome to attend as a pair.

**MORE DETAILS:**

*   **CLOTHING:** Please dress so as to have as much skin exposed as possible (Women could wear thong bottom & bikini top & Men could wear a thong, briefs or boxers... nudity is also very acceptable and in fact encouraged.
*   **PLEASE BRING:** (1) a sheet (2) a large towel & small hand towel (3) Massage oil (coconut oil?) preferably in a spill-proof dispenser! (4) Wet-Wipes (5) A bag lunch each day. Note that there will not be enough time to "go out" for lunch and we invite you to bring something to share with the group to help foster connection and community during our two days together.
*   **MONEY BACK GUARANTEE:** I am confident that you will receive valuable skills, have plenty of Fun and feel enriched by this highly detailed journey....OR... your $$ back (minus any 3rd party processing fees... Must be requested within a week of the workshop completion). Seriously......I am absolutely committed to everyone's happiness, personal growth & satisfaction!
*   **CANCELLATION POLICY:** 7 days notice required for a full refund (minus any 3rd party processing fees). After that point, I am happy to offer 50% of your registration as credit towards any of my future events.
*   **BOUNDARIES:** We will create a "safe space" where everyone‚Äôs individual boundaries will be lovingly respected...‚Ä¶and all exercises are by personal choice only! This event is carefully designed so that attendees can choose to participate at the level that feels comfortable to them in each moment..‚Ä¶. and‚Ä¶..the conditions will be created for each person to play with and expand their boundaries at their own pace. You are invited to be in control of your own journey.

### **MORE INFO can be found at:**

[https://shivaj.com/tantricmassagemasterclass/](https://shivaj.com/tantricmassagemasterclass/)

**ABOUT YOUR FACILITATOR:**

**~ Shiva J** is a Certified Tantra Educator, Kundalini Yoga Instructor, Somatic Bodyworker, Certified Life Coach, Licensed Clinical Hypnotherapist, and Master NLP Practitioner who has been in the world of transformational work since 2003.

With a 20+ year career in the fitness world under his belt he suddenly found himself with a severe back injury that prevented him from continuing on that path. Around the same time he found himself facing divorce, bankruptcy and homelessness. Determined to rise from these pitfalls he began to study holistic wellness, and Tantra to help heal his body, mind and spirit. Having prevailed over a rather bleak and almost hopeless dark night of the soul he experienced a spiritual awakening and discovered his true calling as a healer, and community builder.

With his unique perspective of the mind, body, spirit connection he has helped thousands of clients transform their lives. He combines all of these unique tools along with his gift of insight to help his clients overcome any physical or mental challenge they may be currently experiencing in their lives.

When not at work doing what he loves, Shiva J can be found at a local internet cafe sipping a dirty chai latte, attending ecstatic dancing, a drum circle, or out hiking or biking local trails and if you can't find him at all, he has probably taken a sabbatical and gone hiking or camping someplace more exotic!
